Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible source provided to back up the assertion that Kamala Harris made such a statement.

Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation could be that Kamala Harris supports the idea of reparations but has not specifically proposed a federal tax on homes to pay for them. The claim fails to consider this possibility.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence to suggest that Kamala Harris ever suggested introducing a federal tax on homes to pay for reparations.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in the provided claim.
